quizz_app.descricao: A quiz with questions personalized for the user that, in addition to delivering the result at the end, also sends an email with the details of their answers. It was also made exclusively for totems and mobile devices.
features: Storing user responses in a MongoDB
Sending an email with details of the user's responses

quero_ler.descricao: An application for mobile devices that aims to distribute book pdf's to people who don't have access in a simple wa and fast, with just one login.

see_now.descricao: Another application for mobile devices, developed for a marketing startup from Salvador-BA, with the objective of being a customer dashboard managed by the startup. With it you can see your ads and available ad spots, as well as a chat with the support team.

taximetro.descricao: Third and last application created in Ionic, it aims to predict how much a taxi ride in Salvador-BA would cost.

ranger_bot.descricao: Bot using python, twitter api and riot api. The bot would always retweet a new tweet from a specific user with a image and a comment. All this running 24/7 on an aws server.
features: Retweet new tweets from a specific user
